info.name: Scholarport API - Complete Collection v2.0
info.description:
# Scholarport Backend API Collection

## Complete API documentation for:
- üîê **Authentication** - JWT token management
- üí¨ **Chat System** - AI-powered conversation and university matching
- üìÖ **Booking System** - Counselor session scheduling
- üìù **Blog System** - Educational content management
- üîß **Setup & Testing** - Health checks and documentation

---

## Quick Start

1. Set `base_url` variable to your server (default: `http://localhost:8000`)
2. For admin endpoints, login first to get JWT token
3. Tokens are auto-saved to collection variables

## Authentication

- **Access Token**: Valid for 24 hours
- **Refresh Token**: Valid for 7 days
- Admin endpoints require `Bearer {{access_token}}` header

## Base URLs

| Environment | URL |
|-------------|-----|
| Local | `http://localhost:8000` |
| Production | `https://your-domain.com` |

---

**Version:** 2.0.0  
**Last Updated:** November 30, 2025
